subject: ATTENTION.. SIR
body:
ATTENTION.. SIR
Greetings,  as I did mention my client Jeannot  Ahoussou-Kouadio  is
an Ivorian politician who was Prime Minister of Ivory Coast from March
2012 to November 2012. In 2018, he was appointed president of the
Senate, he has Seventy Five Million Deposited in an ESCROW ACCOUNT of
the BANK OF AFRICA (BOA BENIN) he need a reliable and trustworthy
person that can invest the said FUND into any lucrative business
anywhere in the world for the period of 10 years, presently my client
is under investigation because of this FUND, therefore he want the
said FUND transfer out of the Bank of Africa Benin immediately for
onward investment.
My client has agreed unconditionally and irrevocably to compensate the
Fund Manager with a commission of 10% of the principal Fund for
acceptance, Sir, you as the FUND MANAGER can invest the FUND on your
area of specialization
Note that my client doesn’t want his name to be mentioned in this
transaction because of the situations on ground and his personality
Upon your acceptance to invest the FUND on behalf of my client get
back to me with the following details
1, Name and address
(2) Company name and address
(3)
 Copy of your Identity “passport or National ID card”
(4) Contact Phone Number
This information's are required for me to prepare the CONTRACT
AGREEMENT (MEMORANDUM OF UNDERSTANDING) between the two parties in
case of any breach of contract.
Regards
DR. MAX WILLIAMS

subject: Re: ATTENTION.. SIR
body:
Hello Dr. Max Williams,

Thank you for reaching out to me with this opportunity. I must say, it sounds quite intriguing. I would be interested in learning more about how I can help your client, Mr. Jeannot, with his funds.

Could you please provide me with some additional details? Specifically, I would like to know more about the nature of the business in which the funds will be invested. Additionally, what kind of returns can we expect from this investment?

Furthermore, could you explain why Mr. Jeannot wants to transfer the funds out of the Bank of Africa Benin? Is there a specific reason for this decision?

I look forward to hearing back from you soon.

Best wishes,
Sandy

subject: Re: ATTENTION.. SIR
body:
Thanks for your prompt response  Mrs sandy I did forward  this  your
response to  barrister Jean ake  who did instructed me to give to you his
contact information s? For both of you to discuss further details  I will
appreciate you send to him via email jeanake677@outlook.com  the kinds of
profitable investment projects you have to offer to him in your country
asap thanks again for I look forward to hearing back from you soon and do
have a great day for further inquiries please forward to  him and me your
watsaap number thanks again for I look forward to hearing back from you
soon and do have a great day   his watsaap number is +22951803537  thanks
again and do have a great day.

subject: Re: ATTENTION.. SIR
body:
Hello Mrs. Sandy,

Thank you for your response. I appreciate you forwarding my message to Barrister Jean Ake. I will be happy to discuss further details with him regarding the profitable investment projects in my country.

Could you please provide me with Barrister Jean Ake's email address so that I can send him the information he needs? Also, if it's convenient, could you let me know his WhatsApp number as well?

I look forward to hearing back from both of you soon. Have a great day!

Best wishes,
Sandy

subject: Re: ATTENTION.. SIR
body:

subject: Re: ATTENTION.. SIR
body:
Mrs  sandy how are you doing today?  Have you been able to get in contact
with  the well respected attorney barrister Jean ake?  Please  he
requested  for your watsaap  number  asap for quicker  link up.

subject: Re: ATTENTION.. SIR
body:
Please  Mrs sandy send to me your watsaap number for quicker communication
and link up asap with the well respected attorney barrister Jean ake
thanks for I look forward to hearing back from you soon and do have a great
day.

subject: Re: ATTENTION.. SIR
body:
Hello Mrs. Sandy, thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate your message. However, I prefer to communicate through this platform for now. Could you please provide more information about the well-respected attorney barrister Jean Ake? What is the purpose of connecting with them? I'm curious to know more. Have a great day!

Best wishes,
Sandy

subject: Re: ATTENTION.. SIR
body:
Hello! How can I help you today?

Best wishes,
Sandy

subject: Re: ATTENTION.. SIR
body:
Hello Mrs. Sandy! I'm doing well, thank you for asking. I haven't been in contact with Barrister Jean Ake yet. Could you please tell me more about why he needs my WhatsApp number? What is the purpose of this quicker link up?

Best wishes,
Sandy
